00039 #include <QFileDialog>
00040 #include <QMessageBox>
00041 
00042 #include "ExportDialog.h"
00043 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00044 #include "TShapeKit.h"
00045 
00053 ExportDialog::ExportDialog( SceneModel& sceneModel, QString previousSurfaceUrl, bool previusInGlobal, QString previousFile, QWidget* parent )
00054 :QDialog( parent ),
00055  m_exportSceneModel( &sceneModel ),
00056  m_exportSelectionModel( 0 )
00057 {
00058         setupUi( this );
00059         connect( allMapRadio, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( SetExportAllPhotons( bool ) ) );
00060         connect( surfaceMapRadio, SIGNAL( toggled( bool ) ), this, SLOT( SetExportSurfacePhotons( bool ) ) );
00061         connect( selectFile, SIGNAL( clicked() ), this, SLOT( SelectFile() ) );
00062 
00063         m_exportSelectionModel = new QItemSelectionModel( m_exportSceneModel );
00064 
00065         modelView->setModel( m_exportSceneModel );
00066         modelView->setSelectionModel( m_exportSelectionModel );
00067         modelView->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00068         modelView->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00069         modelView->setRootIsDecorated(true);
00070 
00071         if( !previousSurfaceUrl.isEmpty() )
00072         {
00073                 SetExportSurfacePhotons( true );
00074                 QModelIndex selectedNodeIndex = m_exportSceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( previousSurfaceUrl );
00075                 m_exportSelectionModel->select( selectedNodeIndex, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00076 
00077                 QModelIndex parentIndex = selectedNodeIndex.parent();
00078                 while( parentIndex != QModelIndex() )
00079                 {
00080                         modelView->expand( parentIndex );
00081                         parentIndex = parentIndex.parent();
00082                 }
00083         }
00084 
00085         if( previusInGlobal )   globalCoordinatesRadio->setChecked( true );
00086         else    localCoordinates->setChecked( true );
00087 
00088         if( !previousFile.isEmpty() )   fileNameEdit->setText( previousFile );
00089 }
00090 
00094 ExportDialog::~ExportDialog()
00095 {
00096         delete m_exportSelectionModel;
00097 }
00098 
00102 bool ExportDialog::ExportAllPhotonMap() const
00103 {
00104         if( allMapRadio->isChecked() ) return true;
00105         else return false;
00106 }
00107 
00111 bool ExportDialog::ExportPhotonsInGlobal() const
00112 {
00113         if( globalCoordinatesRadio->isChecked() ) return true;
00114         else return false;
00115 }
00116 
00124 QString ExportDialog::GetExportFileName() const
00125 {
00126         return fileNameEdit->text();
00127 }
00128 
00134 QString ExportDialog::GetSelectedSurface() const
00135 {
00136         if( !surfaceMapRadio->isChecked () ) return 0;
00137         if( !m_exportSelectionModel->hasSelection() ) return 0;
00138 
00139         InstanceNode* selectedNode = m_exportSceneModel->NodeFromIndex( m_exportSelectionModel->currentIndex() );
00140         if( !selectedNode->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return 0;
00141 
00142         //return m_exportSceneModel->PathFromIndex( m_exportSelectionModel->currentIndex() );
00143         return selectedNode->GetNodeURL();
00144 }
00145 
00149 void ExportDialog::accept()
00150 {
00151         if( fileNameEdit->text().isEmpty() )
00152         {
00153                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh ",  "No file defined to save photon map", 1);
00154                             return;
00155         }
00156 
00157         if( surfaceMapRadio->isChecked () )
00158         {
00159                 if( m_exportSelectionModel->hasSelection() )
00160                 {
00161                         InstanceNode* selectedNode = m_exportSceneModel->NodeFromIndex( m_exportSelectionModel->currentIndex() );
00162                         if( !selectedNode->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00163                         {
00164                                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",     "Selected node is not surface node", 1);
00165                                 return;
00166                         }
00167 
00168                 }
00169         }
00170         QDialog::accept();
00171 
00172 }
00173 
00178 void ExportDialog::SetExportAllPhotons( bool allPhotos )
00179 {
00180         if( allPhotos ) allMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00181         else if( ( !allPhotos ) && ( !surfaceMapRadio->isChecked() ) )
00182                 allMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00183 }
00184 
00189 void ExportDialog::SetExportSurfacePhotons( bool surfacePhotos )
00190 {
00191         if( surfacePhotos )     surfaceMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00192         else if( ( !surfacePhotos ) && ( !allMapRadio->isChecked() ) )
00193                 surfaceMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00194 }
00195 
00201 void ExportDialog::SelectFile()
00202 {
00203         QString currentDir = ".";
00204 
00205         QFileInfo currentFile( fileNameEdit->text() );
00206         QDir fileDir = currentFile.absoluteDir();
00207         if( fileDir.exists() ) currentDir = fileDir.absolutePath();
00208 
00209 
00210         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this, tr("Export PhotonMap"),
00211                                 currentDir,
00212                     tr( "Binary data files (*.dat)" ) );
00213 
00214         if( !fileName.isEmpty() )       fileNameEdit->setText( fileName );
00215 }
